charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] set off to do
some shopping in town.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1101_0200:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was walking, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed Calem standing
all alone.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_0301_0300: Hey, what are you up to?
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_0402_0700:
I’m supposed to be meeting up with Serena,
but she hasn’t shown up yet.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_0800:
She’s not usually late to things, so I’m starting to
get a little worried.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_0900: Get outta my face, all right?!
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_1000:
That Pokémon you stole... It’s eager to get back
to its Trainer.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_1200:
You sure that’s how you wanna respond right
now? Heh. You could use some imagination.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_1400: Apologies for the commotion, you three.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_1600:
That battle was over in a snap. Legendary sync
pairs don’t mess around, huh.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_1800:
Although people can never really have control
over what Legendary Pokémon do anyways.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_1900:
Are you OK? You took so long to show up, I was
really getting worried.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2000:
I’m sorry! Zygarde suddenly zoomed off in the
wrong direction...
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2100:
I followed it straight to that incident we all
just saw.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2300:
There’s a reason they call Zygarde the guardian
of the ecosystem.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2400:
Its origins are in the Kalos region, but I’ve heard
of sightings in Alola as well.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2500:
Maybe all the Legendary Pokémon gathered
here on Pasio have put it on alert.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2700:
Team Break must be pretty fearless to do all
the bad stuff they do on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2800:
Any time they act out, there’s a powerful sync
pair there to put them in their place—like
just now.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_2900:
I know, right? They remind me of some other
people I know.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_3000:
I met them when I was traveling through Kalos.
Si... *cough*
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_3100: Strange... They were very strange people.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_0401_3300: Yeah. Or at least I thought so!
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_0402_3500: Oh, never mind! Forget I said anything.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_3700:
Anyway, I think Pasio’s a great environment for
studying Zygarde.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_3800:
Right. That’s why we were meeting up today,
isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_4100: I wanted to go shopping today.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_4200:
I need to find some cute accessories to go with
my new outfit!
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_4400:
Researching Zygarde is important, but I still wanna
have fun with my own hobbies—like fashion!
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_4500:
This sygna suit is proof of the bond I share with
Zygarde, but it’s also an outfit I can enjoy myself!
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_4600:
I guess that makes sense... And taking a break
here and there is probably for the best.
charaepi_ch0130_10_serena/2301_1201_4800:
Bet I can find you a new outfit that’ll match your
style today, too!
